name: Slime Climb (full release)
description:
SLIME CLIMB

A fast-paced action roguelike platformer with a Celeleste-style dash!

Use your skills to quickly make your way up the chasm as far as you can to score as many points as possible. Gain XP to unlock evolution upgrades!

This is the post-jam version of the game. I am still working on it, so feel free to post any ideas you have for future updates :)

All code, sounds and graphics were by arqitech.

Advanced gameplay:

-  dashing down on a jump pad, enemy or crate will give you a massive jump boost, it will also double the points and XP that you gain
-  getting a level-up will slow down the rate at which the lava rises
-  crate jumps are great for keeping combos going

Feel free to post a screenshot of your high score/combo!Also please post any feedback or ideas you have in  the comments :D

I hope you enjoy the game! - arqitech ;)
